questions.question: What is the difference between Phong model of light sources and the reality?

options.A: Phong assumes infinite light sources, while in reality, shadows and inter-reflections occur
options.B: Phong assumes diffuse light only, while in reality, discrete light sources create shadows
options.C: Phong assumes continuous light sources, while in reality, inter-reflections are negligible
options.D: Phong assumes direct light paths, while in reality, sources may be shadowed, and inter-reflections occur

questions.answer: Phong assumes direct light paths, while in reality, sources may be shadowed, and inter-reflections occur

options.D: Ray tracing for both matte and specular surfaces

questions.answer: Ray tracing for mostly specular surfaces and radiosity for mostly matte surfaces

options.D: It is commonly used to compare the values of a variable at a given point in time.

questions.answer: It is commonly used to represent cumulated totals using numbers or percentages over time.

questions.question: A scatter plot is a mathematical diagram using Cartesian coordinates to display values for typically two variables for a set of data. What kind of relationship do the two variables have, in case of increasing trend.
How would you access the column "price" from the dataframe df?
Choose the one that best describes of Seaborn

options.A: Seaborn is a Python visualization library based on scikit-learn
options.B: Seaborn can effectively increase the number of lines of code to create a plot
options.C: Seaborn is a Python visualization library that provides a high-level interface for drawing attractive statistical graphics

questions.answer: Seaborn is a Python visualization library that provides a high-level interface for drawing attractive statistical graphics

questions.question: A developer runs a ls command and sees the following files in their cwd: /user/Animals/Dogs/dogBreeds.txt, /user/Animals/Dogs/dogNames.txt, /user/Animals/Dogs/Fido.png They realize they have accidentally duplicated dogBreeds as dogNames. How would the developer replace the dogNames file to be correct?
Consider the column 'size', select the correct code for simple feature scaling.
Implementing a voice-based interface for Watson Assistant chatbots, there are three approaches. Choose the best answer

options.A: Phone calls, Watson Speech to Text APIs and Text Agent with Watson.
options.B: Phone calls, Watson Text to Speech APIs and Voice Agent with Watson.
options.C: Phone calls, Watson Speech to Text - Text to Speech APIs and Voice Agent with Watson.
options.D: Phone calls, Watson Speech to Text - Text to Speech APIs and Text Agent with Watson.

questions.answer: Phone calls, Watson Speech to Text - Text to Speech APIs and Voice Agent with Watson.

questions.question: Which code sample will produce the first five lines of a .csv file named "dogs.csv"?
What should be investigated to assist with remediation when a process change error occurs?
A developer want to open a file for adding new data into the existing data in the file using this command with open("Users/Animals/Dogs/doNames.txt") as dogName. What is missing from this code?
What attribute or method will give you the data type of each column?
In Watson Assistant, choose the best description of Dialog Skill?

options.A: A dialog skill uses just Watson natural language processing to understand user questions and respond the answers.
options.B: A dialog skill uses just machine learning technologies to understand user questions and respond the answers.
options.C: A dialog skill uses Watson natural language processing and machine learning technologies to understand user questions and respond the answers.

questions.answer: A dialog skill uses Watson natural language processing and machine learning technologies to understand user questions and respond the answers.

questions.question: What is the largest possible element resulting in the operation df.corr()?

A developer has a list of popular cat names as follows: cat_names=np.array(['Felix', 'Garfield', 'Snowball']) The list needs to be updated to remove 'Felix' from the first spot and introduce the new name 'Oreo'. What code will replace 'Felix' with 'Oreo'?
You have dataframe df. to get a summary of all the columns, what is the method is used?
Describe the 3 main layers of Matplotlib Architecture. Choose the best answer.

options.A: End Layer; Middle Layer; Top Layer
options.B: Backend Layer; Middle Layer; Front End Layer
options.C: Hard Layer; Connect Layer; Display Layer
options.D: Backend Layer; Artist Layer; Scripting Layer.

questions.answer: Backend Layer; Artist Layer; Scripting Layer.

questions.question: Choose the best describes of Folium library

options.A: It is a powerful R library that helps you create several types of Leaflet maps
options.B: It enables focus on the binding of data to a map for choropleth visualizations
options.C: It enables focus on passing visualizations as markers on the map
options.D: It enables both the binding of data to a map for choropleth visualizations as well as passing visualizations as markers on the map.

questions.answer: It enables both the binding of data to a map for choropleth visualizations as well as passing visualizations as markers on the map.

field_explanations.course_ID: Mã môn học (Course ID). Ví dụ: CPV301.
field_explanations.quiz_sets: Một mảng (array) chứa các bộ đề thi cho môn học này.
field_explanations.quiz_set: Số thứ tự của bộ đề thi (Quiz Set number) trong mảng `quiz_sets`.
field_explanations.questions: Một mảng (array) chứa danh sách các câu hỏi cho bộ đề tương ứng.
field_explanations.id: Số thứ tự của câu hỏi trong bộ đề.
field_explanations.question: Nội dung/văn bản của câu hỏi trắc nghiệm.
field_explanations.options: Một đối tượng (object) chứa các lựa chọn trả lời. Key là chữ cái (A, B, C, D) và value là nội dung của lựa chọn đó.
field_explanations.answer: Nội dung/văn bản của đáp án đúng. Đối với câu hỏi nhiều đáp án, các đáp án đúng được nối với nhau bằng ' and '.
field_explanations.answer_number: Một mảng (array) chứa chữ cái (hoặc các chữ cái) của đáp án đúng. Ví dụ: ['A'] hoặc ['A', 'B'].
field_explanations.field_explanations: Giải thích ý nghĩa của các trường trong cấu trúc JSON.
